name: Keeper
headline: Taxes made magical
description: Keeper is AI-powered tax filing software that mimics the experience of going to an accountant. Just drop off your forms, answer a few questions, and let Keeper do the rest!
markdown:
raw_markdown='[![Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/6402337862115a29e6feca66_keeper_blue_logo.png)](https://keepertax.com/<https:/keepertax.com>)
[Try for free](https://keepertax.com/<https:/dashboard.keepertax.com/onboarding?utm_source=public_web&utm_medium=organic&utm_campaign=header&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_content=/>)[Login](https://keepertax.com/<https:/dashboard.keepertax.com/login?>)
Covered scenarios
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678db167f2bd86/678583b3ce683660a8055e61_employee.svg)W-2 employeesFull and part-time jobs](https://keepertax.com/</covered-scenarios/w-2-employees>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678db167f2bd86/678583ac0151c32c97a9a7b8_1099-contractor.svg)1099 contractorsIndependent contracting](https://keepertax.com/</covered-scenarios/1099-contractors>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678db167f2bd86/678583a571710675b04ff546_self-employed.svg)Self-employedBusiness owners, LLCs](https://keepertax.com/</covered-scenarios/self-employed>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678db167f2bd86/6785839e8640aa3d2a85238b_parents.svg)ParentsChildcare, college funds](https://keepertax.com/</covered-scenarios/parents>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678db167f2bd86/67858395ce683660a8053943_students.svg)StudentsLoans, and tuition](https://keepertax.com/</covered-scenarios/students>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678db167f2bd86/6785838eed22e7f917f6125a_homeowner.svg)HomeownersMortgages, renovations](https://keepertax.com/</covered-scenarios/homeowners>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678db167f2bd86/67858366627376501b8258ff_homeowner-1.svg)InvestorsStocks, bonds, crypto](https://keepertax.com/</covered-scenarios/investors>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678db167f2bd86/6785835bafb521e0f0835285_homeowner-2.svg)Property managersSingle or multi-property](https://keepertax.com/</covered-scenarios/property-managers>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678db167f2bd86/67858352562788f8b3a41a2a_homeowner-3.svg)ExpatsForeign income, nomads](https://keepertax.com/</covered-scenarios/expats>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678db167f2bd86/6785834724b41a4ca330b560_retirees.svg)RetireesIRAs and retirement](https://keepertax.com/</covered-scenarios/retirees>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678db167f2bd86/6785833d60318e96d7487106_late-filers.svg)Late filersUp to 3 years late](https://keepertax.com/</covered-scenarios/late-filers>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678db167f2bd86/67858334afb521e0f0832c6d_amenders.svg)AmendmentsMistakes happen](https://keepertax.com/</covered-scenarios/amendments>)

Calculators
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/66f2f7a09a1d9178b29cf126_money-recive.svg)Tax Refund CalculatorHow much will you get back?](https://keepertax.com/<https:/www.keepertax.com/1099-tax-calculator>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/66f2f7a041a81b59ac7c88a6_percentage-square.svg)Tax Rate CalculatorHow much to set aside?](https://keepertax.com/<https:/www.keepertax.com/self-employment-tax-rate-calculator>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/66f2f7a151246392b46dde91_element-plus.svg)Quarterly Tax CalculatorCalculate estimated payments](https://keepertax.com/<https:/www.keepertax.com/quarterly-tax-calculator>)

[Partner with us](https://keepertax.com/</partner-with-us>)
# File your complex taxesconfidently‍
Intuitive tax filing software backed by tax pros and powered by AI.
[Try for free](https://keepertax.com/<https:/dashboard.keepertax.com/onboarding?utm_source=public_web&utm_medium=organic&utm_campaign=header&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_content=/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/67aceb0ebd68dad37cdcef00_tax-help.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/671bd8d56889d63cd8a7d675_reviews-1.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/671bd8d56b63dc4ce39c2e11_reviews.png)
![Featured by Apple](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/6707c9d7663ac2c556d20880_accolades.png)
![Forbes](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/6707c9d7f10ed02bb97f3d41_accolades-1.png)
![Vice](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/6707c9d7cda3c363f6b729f0_accolades-2.png)
![TechCrunch](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/6707c9dd8369cc822f37cd9b_accolades-3.png)
Drag. Drop. Done!
  * Photos, pdfs - drop off whatever you have
  * Forgot something? We’ll remind you
  * Feels like filing with an accountant

[Get Started](https://keepertax.com/<https:/dashboard.keepertax.com/onboarding?utm_source=public_web&utm_medium=organic&utm_campaign=header&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_content=/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/672918fa1215ddd8b9456024_drag_drop_done_v2.gif)
AI finds  every deduction
  * Securely connect your bank or credit card with Plaid
  * Categorization & prediction powered by AI
  * 20,000+ financial institutions supported

[Find my tax deductions](https://keepertax.com/<https:/dashboard.keepertax.com/onboarding?utm_source=public_web&utm_medium=organic&utm_campaign=header&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_content=/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/672918fa8124028f5ab8c12e_scanning_expenses.gif)
Get instant answers
  * [AI tax assistant](https://keepertax.com/<https:/www.keepertax.com/ask-an-ai-accountant-2-0>) more accurate than human accountants
  * Fine-tuned on thousands of pages of tax law
  * Human tax pros ready to jump in

[Get started](https://keepertax.com/<https:/dashboard.keepertax.com/onboarding?utm_source=public_web&utm_medium=organic&utm_campaign=header&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_content=/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/672918fa2befaf756d57327a_tax_question_2024.gif)
Expert-reviewed returns
  * Every return is reviewed & signed by a tax pro
  * 300+ automated checks to keep you safe
  * File with 100% confidence

[Start filing my taxes](https://keepertax.com/<https:/dashboard.keepertax.com/onboarding?utm_source=public_web&utm_medium=organic&utm_campaign=header&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_content=/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/671bcda2dfef1417e62c7f6b_Frame%20427319693-2.png)
Stay organized year-round
  * Mobile app or web dashboard - whatever you prefer
  * Categories, notes, receipt photos, and more
  * Smart notifications to keep you on track

[Track my expenses](https://keepertax.com/<https:/dashboard.keepertax.com/onboarding?utm_source=public_web&utm_medium=organic&utm_campaign=header&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_content=/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/672918fadbb655aee1535795_marking_a_write-off.gif)
## Over 15,000 reviews

## Real stories, real results
free live webinar
## Learn the basics of self-employment taxes
##### When
Thursday, 10:00am PT / 1:00pm ET(~30 minutes long)
##### What
Get a free overview of the most important things you’ll need to know as you file self-employed taxes. Plus a live Q&A at the end.
##### Who it's for
Self-employed people, freelancers, people earning 1099 income
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/679bb97b40dce2ecaa395119_tax-filing.png)
[Register now](https://keepertax.com/<https:/zoom.us/webinar/register/5817389676747/WN_G572WTgCT2C96rBoL6P9Ug#/registration>)
## Reasonable, flexible pricing
Just tax filing
## $99/yr
  * Federal & State e-filing
  * Audit protection
  * Max refund guarantee
  * Reviewed & signed by a tax pro
  * 300+ credits supported


Filing + deductions
## $199/yr
  * Everything in **Just tax filing**
  * Claim business deductions
  * Automatic deduction tracking
  * Quarterly payment support
  * Link up to 10 financial accounts
  * Upload receipt photos


Premium
## $399/yr
  * Everything in **Filing + deductions**
  * Extra complex individual tax situations (e.g. K-1s, rental properties, AMT)
  * Keeper files your quarterlies
  * Amend or file prior year returns
  * Audit resolution support


Need more help?
## Contact us
  * S Corp & partnership filing
  * Business formation and business bookkeeping
  * Tax planning
  * 1:1 call with an accountant


[Get started](https://keepertax.com/</consultation-with-a-tax-pro>)
[Compare plans](https://keepertax.com/</compare-plans>)
## Instant answers to your tax questions
Test Keeper’s AI accountant with any of your burning tax questions.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/633d2b9436ac35b543cb2040_big%20Favicon%20Icon.svg)
1099 taxes are hard! That’s why we’re here to answer all of your most difficult tax questions. Ask away?

## Frequently asked questions
Are there any tax situations _too_ complex for Keeper?
![Plus Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/6352438d506ca3e14c70d379_plus.svg)![Minus Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/633d14aef41a8505557fce12_minus.svg)
Keeper can handle almost every individual tax filing complexity, as well as some basic corporate tax returns such as S Corps and joint partnerships. By coupling our service with a network of tax pros, you'll be in good hands no matter how complicated your situation might be.
What is the free trial period?
![Plus Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/6352438d506ca3e14c70d379_plus.svg)![Minus Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/633d14aef41a8505557fce12_minus.svg)
Try Keeper absolutely free for 7 days! You can start tracking your deductions, get unlimited tax help, and begin filing your taxes. If you’d like to submit your taxes to the IRS & State, you’ll need to pay for the annual subscription.
Why do I have to link my bank account?
![Plus Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/6352438d506ca3e14c70d379_plus.svg)![Minus Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/633d14aef41a8505557fce12_minus.svg)
Hidden in your bank transactions are potentially thousands of dollars in deductible business expenses. When you link your bank account, we scan your transactions to find expenses that are commonly deductible for people in your line of work.
Does Keeper have an app?
![Plus Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/6352438d506ca3e14c70d379_plus.svg)![Minus Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5cdcb07b95678daa55f2bd83/633d14aef41a8505557fce12_minus.svg)
Yes, Keeper is also available on iOS App Store, or Android's Google Play.

## Frequently asked questions
Are there any tax situations _too_ complex for Keeper?
![Plus Icon⟨35⟩]![Minus Icon⟨36⟩]
Keeper can handle almost every individual tax filing complexity, as well as some basic corporate tax returns such as S Corps and joint partnerships. By coupling our service with a network of tax pros, you'll be in good hands no matter how complicated your situation might be.
What is the free trial period?
![Plus Icon⟨35⟩]![Minus Icon⟨36⟩]
Try Keeper absolutely free for 7 days! You can start tracking your deductions, get unlimited tax help, and begin filing your taxes. If you’d like to submit your taxes to the IRS & State, you’ll need to pay for the annual subscription.
Why do I have to link my bank account?
![Plus Icon⟨35⟩]![Minus Icon⟨36⟩]
Hidden in your bank transactions are potentially thousands of dollars in deductible business expenses. When you link your bank account, we scan your transactions to find expenses that are commonly deductible for people in your line of work.
Does Keeper have an app?
![Plus Icon⟨35⟩]![Minus Icon⟨36⟩]
Yes, Keeper is also available on iOS App Store, or Android's Google Play.

generated_description:
### Keeper Tax: Making Taxes Magical

Started in **2019** as part of Y Combinator's **Batch W19**, Keeper is a San Francisco-based fintech company dedicated to simplifying the tax filing process. With a mission encapsulated in their tagline, "Taxes made magical," Keeper leverages AI to create a user-friendly tax filing experience that mirrors working with a real accountant. You can simply drop off your forms, answer a few intuitive questions, and let Keeper handle the rest.

#### The Concept

The essence of Keeper’s appeal is its automation. Picture this: you drag-and-drop documents into a digital interface—like sending something off to a physical accountant. It's that simple. Users can expect reminders for any potential missing forms and the system lays out the process in a way that feels familiar and secure. 

#### What They Do

Keeper caters to diverse scenarios. Whether you're a W-2 employee, a 1099 contractor, self-employed, a parent, student, homeowner, investor, or even a retiree, Keeper has established tailored pathways for your tax needs. Their critical features include:

- **AI-powered deduction tracking:** It connects securely to your bank accounts to identify deductible expenses, maximizing your potential refunds.
- **Instant support via AI:** Their AI Accountant is trained on extensive tax law, providing you with accurate guidance and answers to your burning questions.
- **Expert-reviewed tax returns:** Every return is cross-checked by a human tax professional and insured with over **300 automated checks** for safety.

#### Team and Growth

Currently, Keeper operates with a compact yet efficient team of **23 employees**, with powerful backing from its Group Partner, Nan. Having relocated to **San Francisco**, the company positions itself strongly within the Bay Area's tech landscape, focused squarely on transforming the consumer tax experience.

#### User Experience and Support

What users love most about Keeper is the confidence it instills during tax season. With an average rating of **4.8/5** from over **15,000 reviews**, testimonials highlight the seamless experience and excellent customer support that makes tax filing not just feasible but enjoyable. It’s a tool that promises to turn the often dreaded task of taxes into something straightforward and even empowering for users.

#### Pricing

Keeper offers subscriptions that cater to various needs:
- **Just Tax Filing:** $99/year 
- **Filing + Deductions:** $199/year
- **Premium Offerings:** $399/year

This tiered structure ensures accessibility for individuals with simple tax needs and those needing comprehensive solutions for complex situations.

### Conclusion

In a world where taxes can feel overwhelming, Keeper is leading the charge with innovation and clarity. They prove that filing taxes does not have to be a burden; with their well-thought-out platform, they transform the experience into something manageable—yes, even magical.

For more information on services offered or to try it yourself, visit their [website](https://keepertax.com) or dive directly into the platform. The future of tax filing is here, and it’s as easy as drag and drop.
